So, I need to find someone willing to make that commitment because it is hard work.... It is important to me that I have people I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors. `` It strains credulity to expect anyone to believe that the position of the British government wasn't well known by those who granted Abdelbaset al-Megrahi his so-called compassionate release,'' said Sen. Charles Ellis Schumer ( D-N.Y.). This report confirms what many of us have long suspected: the British government and BP wanted Abdelbaset al-Megrahi released so that an oil deal being negotiated with Libya could go forward. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand said the findings only heighten her worry that Megrahi's release undermines the international struggle against terrorism.`` Economic and trade interests should never take precedence over matters of justice,'' Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.
